pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Zero-Inflated Bernoulli Regression Model // Fits a Bayesian zero-inflated Bernoulli regression model handling (potentially) different covariates for the zero-inflated and non zero-inflated parts. See Moria D, Puig P, Navarro A. (2021) doi:10.1186/s12874-021-01427-2.
